trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> (or other server or user) controls.
trans-unit.target: 做為所有區域控制項的基底類別，而這些控制項則做為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> (或其他伺服器或使用者) 控制項的容器。

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項集合中，區域是複合控制項，轉譯為 HTML 表格，包含定義網頁的區域中的其他控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class is a zone that inherits from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, server controls, and user controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別是繼承自基底區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>類別，並提供一組基本的行為衍生區域包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項、 伺服器控制項和使用者控制項。

trans-unit.source: The combination of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time.
trans-unit.target: 組合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>（和其他伺服器） 控制項表單的 Web 組件的應用程式，標準使用者與大部分的情況下進行互動的頁面檢視的主要 UI。

trans-unit.source: All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain.
trans-unit.target: 所有區域包含的控制項都提供一組常用的 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class.
trans-unit.target: UI 項目通用於所有區域的詳細討論，請參閱類別概觀主題適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域包含包含伺服器控制項相關聯的本文區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>物件用來呈現所包含的控制項和其 chrome，其動詞命令、 和等元素的框線，等等。

trans-unit.source: In addition to the features inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features.
trans-unit.target: 除了繼承自功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別會加入用戶端控制項拖曳、 特定的動詞命令 （以啟用一般 UI 動作例如降至最低，關閉、 刪除和編輯控制項），以及其他樣式功能。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別也是如果您想要設計的自訂區域資料庫導向繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>, and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that are data-bound and display weather information.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可以建立繼承自天氣自訂 Web 組件區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>，而且設計來包含和提供的版面配置功能和其他服務的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>是資料繫結並顯示天氣資訊的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別包含數個區域中的樣式屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: There are several properties for borders, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有幾個屬性的框線，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>。

trans-unit.source: There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>, and others.
trans-unit.target: 沒有內容功能表才會出現在標頭的區域，例如的樣式屬性所使用的一群<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>，和其他人。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別也包含用於處理區域中的動詞命令的成員數目。

trans-unit.source: These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 這些成員與相關聯的動詞命令，會出現在組件中的控制項區域。

trans-unit.source: While zone-level verbs can be added to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones, by default they do not have any.
trans-unit.target: 雖然區域層級動詞命令可以加入至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域，依預設並沒有任何。

trans-unit.source: There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well.
trans-unit.target: 沒有一組設定以用於組件控制項之 Web 組件控制項所提供的標準動詞命令，而且開發人員可以加入自訂的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令所使用的一些重要屬性包括屬性會參考某些一個標準動詞的物件，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 在區域中包含的每個控制項的標題列中 （通常是在 UI 中以下拉功能表呈現） 動詞命令功能表顯示的標準動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: There is also a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 另外還有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>屬性，可讓您判斷哪些類型的可點按物件代表在 UI 中的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Other key members for working with verbs include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令所使用的其他索引鍵成員包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法但不會覆寫自訂動詞命令建立程序處理的事件處理常式，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class contains a number of members for working with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained within a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別使用包含的成員數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域內所包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property references the collection of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>屬性參考的所有集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>（和其他伺服器） 的區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 數個方法會對應至使用者可以在上執行的標準動詞命令或動作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項在區域中，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>。

trans-unit.source: There are also a number of members in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class that concern how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are laid out or arranged within the zone.
trans-unit.target: 另外還有中的成員數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別該顧慮如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>配置或在區域中排列控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>屬性決定控制項是否可以在區域之間移動或重新排列區域內的使用者。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>屬性可讓您決定是否水平或垂直排列的控制項區域中。

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer might render the height of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 可能會呈現的高度<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>或其包含的控制項，以非預期的方式，在區域的方向而定。

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Other methods in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone.
trans-unit.target: 中的其他方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別提供您詳細以程式設計方式控制區域的各個區域的轉譯。

trans-unit.source: Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 這些方法覆寫繼承自基底方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>類別，以自訂的區域，其中包含轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Important methods include <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 重要的方法包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: The code shows how a derived class, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>, is used declaratively in a Web Parts page to contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會示範如何在衍生類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>，用於以宣告方式在 Web 組件頁面中包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four sections: the first three sections describe the code files, and the fourth explains how to run the code.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例有四個區段： 前三個區段描述程式碼檔案和第四個說明如何執行的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is a user control that enables users to switch the page into different display modes.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者將頁面切換至不同的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information on Web Parts display modes and a description of the code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 Web 組件的顯示模式及說明此控制項中的程式碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is a code-beside file that contains the code to handle events for the main Web page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是程式碼除外的檔案，其中包含處理事件的主要網頁的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The code in this file shows how to work with some of the key <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> members programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 這個檔案中的程式碼示範如何使用一些索引鍵的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>成員以程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is the Web page that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> controls that exhibit behavior from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained in the zones.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是包含網頁<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項的行為的基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中所包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Load the Web page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 載入網頁瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into design mode, click the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, and try dragging them between the visible zones.
trans-unit.target: 使用**顯示模式**將頁面切換到設計模式，請按一下下拉式清單控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，並再試一次可見區域之間拖曳的方式。

trans-unit.source: Click some of the buttons on the page to see the effect of using various members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 按一下以查看使用中的各個成員的效果頁面上的按鈕部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: Next, switch the page to edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 接下來，將頁面切換至編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: Make sure a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is positioned in `WebPartZone2`, click the verbs menu on the control's title bar, and click **Edit** to edit the control.
trans-unit.target: 請確定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項放置在`WebPartZone2`，按一下動詞命令功能表控制項的標題列，然後按一下**編輯**，編輯控制項。

trans-unit.source: Finish editing that control, and then edit one of the controls in the other zone.
trans-unit.target: 完成編輯該控制項，然後再編輯其他區域中控制項的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: As you carry out these steps, notice the differences in the UI styles of the controls and the zones, which are the effect of using the various members of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 在您執行下列步驟，請注意到控制項和區域 的 UI 樣式中的差異所使用的許多成員的效果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the layout of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls can be changed within a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的配置是否可以變更。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the layout can be changed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果配置可以變更，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>屬性在區域是所在區域中控制項的配置可以變更，例如頁面顯示模式時，才會生效<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone:
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>設`false`在給定的區域中，有數個使用者無法在區域中控制項上執行的動作：

trans-unit.source: Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法將控制項拖曳至不同的區域、 重新排列控制項內的區域，或將控制項移至該區域。

trans-unit.source: A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> controls..
trans-unit.target: 影響的使用者介面 (UI) 的屬性數目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>，讓使用者無法編輯這些屬性，使用編輯控制項時，會停用區域中的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>控制項...

trans-unit.source: Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用者無法將新的控制項，加入將區域從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 關閉、 刪除、 降到最低，以及還原動詞命令不會顯示區域中控制項上。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>屬性會影響使用者的能力變更透過 UI 區域的版面配置，不會影響以程式設計方式變更版面配置的能力。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> method to close controls programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>設`false`，使用者無法關閉區域中的控制項，但開發人員仍然可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>以程式設計方式控制方法，關閉。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓使用者關閉區域中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that enables end users to close <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，可讓使用者關閉 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The close verb referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> property appears in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 關閉所參考的動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>屬性會出現在每個動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone that contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, a user can switch the page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 在關閉控制項移除它互動的網頁上，雖然如果開發人員提供適當的使用者介面 (UI)，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>區域包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制項，使用者可以將頁面切換成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>並加入先前的關閉的網頁控制項的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要的範例 > 一節中的所有程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the help verb is enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 以下的部分程式碼範例是部分類別中，從，而且包含切換說明動詞命令為啟用或停用的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the UI.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的其他部分是網頁上裝載自訂控制項，其中包含 UI。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the declarative `<CloseVerb>` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the close verb in the verbs menu for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，宣告式`<CloseVerb>`區域中的項目設定代表關閉動詞命令的動詞命令功能表中的特定文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Notice also that, because the underlying custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control--named `TextDisplayWebPart`-- used in the code example sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property to `false` in its constructor, the `<aspSample:TextDisplayPart>` element in the catalog must set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property to `true`, so that the control can be closed in the following code example.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，因為基礎的自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制--名為`TextDisplayWebPart`-用於程式碼範例會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>屬性`false`在其建構函式，`<aspSample:TextDisplayPart>`目錄中的項目必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>屬性`true`，好讓控制項可以關閉下列程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並加入`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入網頁。

trans-unit.source: You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the close verb, and you can click the **Close WebPart** verb in the verbs menu to close the control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用核取方塊，啟用和停用關閉的動詞命令，而且您可以按一下**關閉的 WebPart**關閉控制項的動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: After you close the control, if you return the page to catalog display mode, you can click the **Page Catalog**, select the original instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control that you closed, and reopen it on the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將網頁傳回給目錄的顯示模式，則會關閉控制項之後，您可以按一下**頁面目錄**，選取的原始執行個體`TextDisplayWebPart`控制您關閉，再重新開啟頁面上。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to be closed.
trans-unit.target: 要關閉的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Closes a selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 關閉區域中已選取的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The typical way for an end user to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 若要關閉的終端使用者的一般方式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，請按一下控制項的標題列中關閉的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which carries out the action of closing the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>類別，會關閉該控制項的動作執行。

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法應該只能由衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>這類區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>。

trans-unit.source: A closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not rendered on a page.
trans-unit.target: 關閉<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項不會呈現在網頁上。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: 不過，它會加入至頁面類別目錄，會維護所有已關閉的控制項在頁面上的清單。

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `<asp:PageCatalogPart>` element declared with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 組件頁面使用者關閉控制項也有`<asp:PageCatalogPart>`與宣告的項目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>，使用者就可以將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並將已關閉的控制項加入至網頁。

trans-unit.source: For a user to be able to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property on the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property on the zone must both be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 使用者要能夠關閉<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>控制項上的屬性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>區域上的屬性必須都設為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object that enables end users to create connections between <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓使用者建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之間的連接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that creates a connection between two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，可在兩個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之間建立連接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that initiates the connection with another selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項，啟始與另一個已選取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的連線。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of creating a connection between two <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 啟始在兩個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之間建立連接的處理序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A> method can be called only when the page is in connect display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>頁面是在連接的顯示模式時，才可以呼叫方法 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>)。

trans-unit.source: The method in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A> method, which completes the several steps necessary to fully connect two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>方法，完成幾個完整連接兩個所需的步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法應該只能由衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>這類區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of child controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 建立區域中所包含的一組子控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateChildControls%2A> method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to create the set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateChildControls%2A>方法會覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法來建立一組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中所包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the Web Parts page is in design mode, because the layout of the controls on the page (and within zones) can be changed in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 這是當 Web 組件頁面處於設計模式中，因為可以在設計模式中變更控制項在頁面上 （與區域內） 的配置。

trans-unit.source: The set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls within a zone must likewise be created to accommodate possible changes in the order or occurrence of controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 一組<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域內的控制項必須同樣地建立要容納可能變更的順序或區域中控制項的次數。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> object that contains all the controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> 物件，其中包含區域中所有控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" /> that contains references to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ControlCollection" />，其中包含區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of style characteristics that apply to a zone control when it is visible.
trans-unit.target: 建立一組樣式特性，以便在區域控制項可見時，套用至此控制項上。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains style attributes for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，其中包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateControlStyle%2A> method creates a set of standard style attributes that apply to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateControlStyle%2A>方法會建立一組標準的樣式屬性套用至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: The style attributes apply only when a page is in a display mode in which a zone itself is visible, such as catalog, edit, or design display mode.
trans-unit.target: 只有當頁面處於所在區域本身為可見的例如類別目錄、 編輯或設計顯示模式的顯示模式套用這些樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateControlStyle" /> method to set some specific properties on the created style, do not use the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.#ctor(System.Web.UI.StateBag)" /> version of the constructor, which requires you to pass the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object in as a parameter, resulting in the created <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object sharing the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> with the zone control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateControlStyle" />方法來設定某些特定的屬性上建立的樣式，請勿使用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.#ctor(System.Web.UI.StateBag)" />建構函式，這需要您將控制項傳遞版本<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" />物件做為參數，導致建立<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />物件共用<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" />與區域控制項。

trans-unit.source: This causes rendering problems.
trans-unit.target: 這會造成呈現問題。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.#ctor" /> version of the constructor, so the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> object is independent of the control.
trans-unit.target: 請改用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.#ctor" />版本的建構函式，所以<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />物件無關的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在為衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 類別的區域建立動詞命令時發生。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> child zone.
trans-unit.target: 網頁開發人員可以將處理常式加入至這個事件，並附加額外的自訂動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>子區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> stage of page processing, or during postback events.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>動詞命令建立區域時，就會引發事件也就是期間<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>階段網頁處理，或在回傳事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method to add a custom verb to a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>藉由覆寫事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法將自訂的指令動詞新增至衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: The code example contains two source files.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含兩個原始程式檔。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses dynamic compilation.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分會是原始碼的簡單控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method to add a custom verb to the zone.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是針對衍生的原始程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法將自訂的指令動詞新增至區域。

trans-unit.source: The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也會建立自訂動詞命令顯示的動詞命令功能表中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項包含在此區域中，並動詞命令建立另一份目前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是裝載在衍生的區域的網頁和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面頂端附近是`Register`指示詞參考衍生的區域元件。

trans-unit.source: If you load the page in a browser, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control appears in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器，將頁面載入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項會出現在區域中。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [動作] 功能表，然後按一下**CopyWebPart**動詞命令，並建立一份控制項。

trans-unit.source: Enables derived zones to substitute a custom <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> object to change the appearance of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 讓衍生區域能夠取代自訂的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> 物件，以變更區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> that determines how <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone are rendered.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" />，決定區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項呈現的方式。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 每個框架周邊的使用者介面 (UI) 項目是指 web 組件 chrome<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The chrome for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar.
trans-unit.target: Chrome<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制權 」 包括框線、 標題列、 圖示、 標題文字和標題列中出現的動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 色彩的外觀設定區域層級，且適用於所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object affects the entire rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, not merely their chrome elements.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>物件會影響整個轉譯<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，不只是其 chrome 的項目。

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> method, you must create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A>方法，您必須建立自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>物件來定義區域中的 Web 組件控制項色彩的外觀。

trans-unit.source: You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class and overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 您也必須建立自訂區域繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別並覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A>可以取代您的自訂色彩物件，並將其套用至區域中控制項的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object that enables end users to delete the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓使用者刪除區域中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that enables end users to delete <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，可讓使用者刪除 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The delete verb referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 所參考的刪除指令動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>屬性會出現在動詞命令下拉式功能表中的每個動態標題列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page).
trans-unit.target: 無法使用靜態控制項 （控制項的網頁標記中宣告） 上的 delete 動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令功能表中的動詞命令會顯示只有當頁面處於顯示模式，可讓您變更頁面配置，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page.
trans-unit.target: 永久刪除控制項，從頁面中移除該控制項的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page.
trans-unit.target: 不同於已關閉的控制項，控制項的已刪除執行個體永遠不可以加回頁面。

trans-unit.source: When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, the deleted control instance is not available in it.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者刪除控制項，並接著切換至頁面<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>區域包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控制項，刪除的控制項執行個體不是可用的。

trans-unit.source: The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可在目錄中，但已永久移除已刪除的執行個體，使用者可以將控制項的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要的範例 > 一節中的所有程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the delete verb is enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 以下的部分程式碼範例是部分類別中，從，而且包含切換刪除動詞命令為啟用或停用的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的其他部分是網頁上裝載自訂控制項，其中包含使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the declarative `<DeleteVerb>` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the delete verb in the verbs drop-down menu for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，宣告式`<DeleteVerb>`區域中的項目設定表示 delete 動詞命令的指令動詞 下拉式清單功能表中的特定文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並加入`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入網頁。

trans-unit.source: You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the delete verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, but the verb appears on the menu only while the page is in catalog or design display mode.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用核取方塊來啟用和停用刪除動詞命令`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，但是動詞命令時，會出現在功能表上只有頁面是在類別目錄或設計顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Delete WebPart** verb on the menu, the control is permanently deleted, and the deleted instance cannot be added back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果您按一下**刪除 WebPart**功能表上的動詞命令，永久刪除控制項，並已刪除的執行個體不能加入至網頁。

trans-unit.source: However, you can return the page to catalog display mode, and add a new instance of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以將網頁傳回給目錄的顯示模式，並加入的新執行個體`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 要刪除的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 刪除區域中已選取的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and if `webPart` is static, an exception is thrown because static controls (controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page) cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，而且如果`webPart`是靜態的會擲回例外狀況因為無法刪除靜態控制項 （在網頁標記中宣告的控制項）。

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法應該只能由衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>這類區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the text being used as the title for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone when the zone itself is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前的文字值，該值是在區域本身為可見時，用來做為 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 區域的標題。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title text for a zone.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含區域的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the base <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是基底 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText" /> 屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DisplayTitle%2A> property either gets its value from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A> property or, if that value is `null`, uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value for the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DisplayTitle%2A>屬性可能是取得其值的基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>屬性或者該值是否`null`，會使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>區域的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DisplayTitle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DisplayTitle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Notice that in the following code example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DisplayTitle%2A> property value is retrieved from the partial class.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，在下列程式碼範例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DisplayTitle%2A>部分的類別從擷取屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否可以將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項拖入或拖出區域。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether controls can be dragged.
trans-unit.target: 布林值，指出是否可以拖曳控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragDropEnabled%2A> property indicates whether <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragDropEnabled%2A>屬性會指出是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項可以拖曳出來，放入或移出區域在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The property is used specifically for checking whether the page is in a page display mode that allows drag-and-drop editing, and whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 屬性專門用於檢查頁面是否在拖放編輯，可讓網頁顯示模式，以及是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color around the border of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone and its drop-cue regions when a user is dragging a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定色彩，該色彩是使用者拖曳控制項時，圍繞 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 區域及其置放提示區的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that contains the highlight color.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，包含反白顯示色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Blue" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設色彩為 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Color.Blue" />。

trans-unit.source: When a dragged control is held over a zone where it can be dropped, drop-cue regions appear, showing the area in which the control can be dropped, and it is for these regions, as well as the zone itself, that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A> property affects the border color.
trans-unit.target: 當被拖曳的控制項保留的區域，其中您可以加以卸除、 卸除提示區域出現，顯示的區域中的控制項可以卸除，也就是這些區域，以及區域本身，透過的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A>屬性會影響的框線色彩。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A> property enables you to set the color that appears to a user when they drag a control in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A>屬性可讓您設定為使用者顯示的色彩，當他們在區域中拖曳控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A> property takes effect only when a Web page is in a display mode that enables the layout of a zone to be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A>屬性在網頁上會顯示模式，可讓予以變更，例如區域的版面配置時，才會生效<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A> property value is set to a specific color.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragHighlightColor%2A>屬性值設定為特定的色彩。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page into a browser and switch the page into design display mode, you can see the effect of the property when you select and drag the control within its zone, or drag another control into the zone.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器中載入網頁，並將頁面切換成設計顯示模式之後，您可以選取並拖曳控制項在其區域，或將另一個控制項拖曳到區域時看到屬性的效果。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object that enables end users to edit <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓使用者編輯區域中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that enables end users to edit <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，可讓使用者編輯 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The edit verb referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control enables an end user to switch a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the zone into edit mode, where the user can personalize the appearance, properties, layout, and content of the control.
trans-unit.target: 所參考的編輯動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控制項可讓使用者切換<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>進入編輯模式，其中使用者可以個人外觀、 屬性、 配置和控制項的內容區域中控制項。

trans-unit.source: The same edit verb is used for all controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 相同的編輯動詞命令用來在區域中的所有控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts page enters into the edit display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>), the edit verb becomes visible in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件頁面時進入編輯顯示模式 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>)，編輯動詞命令會顯示的動詞命令功能表中的每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域內包含的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Note that the property is accessed declaratively by using the `<EditVerb>` element with the `WebPartZone1` control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意在屬性經過存取以宣告方式使用`<EditVerb>`具有項目`WebPartZone1`控制項。

trans-unit.source: An edit verb would be present on this control in edit mode even if you did not use the `<EditVerb>` element here, but by using it, you can set some of its attributes, such as the text that represents the verb in the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 編輯動詞命令會存在於這個控制項上處於編輯模式下，即使您未使用`<EditVerb>`項目，但使用它，您可以設定它的一些屬性，例如的文字表示的使用者介面 (UI) 中的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to be edited.
trans-unit.target: 要編輯的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of editing a selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 啟始編輯區域中已選取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的處理序。

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法應該只能由衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>這類區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a message that appears when a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> control contains no <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定訊息，該訊息會在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 控制項不包含任何 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項時顯示。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含空白區域中出現的訊息。

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 預設的特定文化特性字串是由 .NET Framework 所提供。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property overrides the base property to distinguish between cases where the property has not been set and those where it has been set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>屬性會覆寫基底屬性，以辨別其中尚未設定此屬性的案例和其中它已設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If the property has not been set and the zone contains no controls, when a Web Parts page enters into a display mode where the zone is visible, a default culture-specific text message appears in an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定的屬性，而且區域不包含控制項，Web 組件頁面當進入時的顯示模式所在區域為可見，則預設文化特性特有的文字訊息會出現在空<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property value has intentionally been set to an empty string, then no text message appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>刻意為空字串，設定屬性值，則文字會不顯示任何訊息空白區域中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>屬性包含指派給它的宣告式標記中的值。

trans-unit.source: This value will appear in `WebPartZone2`, after you load the page into a browser, switch the page into design display mode, and drag the control that displays the date from `WebPartZone2` into `WebPartZone1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會出現在`WebPartZone2`之後您將頁面載入瀏覽器中，, 將頁面切換成設計顯示模式，並拖曳控制項所顯示的日期，從`WebPartZone2`到`WebPartZone1`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on changing display modes in a Web Parts page, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何變更 Web 組件頁面中的顯示模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object that enables end users to export an XML definition file for each <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓使用者匯出區域中各個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的 XML 定義檔。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that enables end users to export a definition file for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，可讓使用者匯出 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的定義檔。

trans-unit.source: The export verb referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ExportVerb%2A> property appears in the verbs drop-down menu within the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 所參考的匯出指令動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ExportVerb%2A>屬性會出現在動詞命令下拉式功能表中的每個標題列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu in all page display modes.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令會出現在動詞命令功能表中所有頁面顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: To enable users to export a definition file for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property on a control to something other than its default value, which is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.None>.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓使用者匯出定義檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，您也必須設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>屬性為其預設值，亦即以外的控制項上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode.None>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ExportVerb%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ExportVerb%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要的範例 > 一節中的所有程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the export verb is enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 以下的部分程式碼範例是部分類別中，從，而且包含切換匯出動詞命令為啟用或停用的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control and contains the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的其他部分是網頁上裝載自訂控制項，其中包含使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the declarative `<ExportVerb>` element in the zone sets the specific text that represents the export verb in the verbs drop-down menu for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，宣告式`<ExportVerb>`區域中的項目設定代表匯出動詞命令的指令動詞 下拉式清單功能表中的特定文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Finally, notice that in the following code example, the declarative <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property value on the `<asp:TextDisplayWebPart>` element is set to the value `All`, meaning that all exportable property values on the control will be exported.
trans-unit.target: 最後，請注意在下列程式碼範例中，宣告式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>上的屬性值`<asp:TextDisplayWebPart>`元素設定為值`All`，這表示在控制項上的所有匯出的屬性值將會匯出。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並加入`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入網頁。

trans-unit.source: You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the export verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用核取方塊來啟用和停用匯出的動詞命令`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。

trans-unit.source: If you click the export verb, you are prompted for a local path to save a definition file for the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果您按一下 匯出動詞命令，系統會提示您儲存控制項的定義檔的本機路徑。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part" /> control for which the zone needs to retrieve the current <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType" /> setting.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part" /> 控制項，區域必須為它擷取目前的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType" /> 設定。

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual or effective current <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" /> value of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control, given the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType" /> property of the zone and the current display mode of the Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供區域 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" /> 屬性和 Web 組件頁面的目前顯示模式，則會傳回 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之實際或有效的目前 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" /> value that contains the kind of border that currently frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" /> 值，包含目前架構區域中 Web 組件控制項的框線類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets an initial collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls contained in a zone, based on a template or some storage medium.
trans-unit.target: 根據樣板或一些存放媒體，取得包含在區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的初始集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> that contains the initial set of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls that belong in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" />，其中包含置於區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的初始集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.GetInitialWebParts%2A> method gets the initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls for a zone only if there is a preexisting template or other form of storage that determines what controls are in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.GetInitialWebParts%2A>方法取得的初始集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制區域，只有當此時預先存在的範本或其他形式的決定控制項的區域中的儲存體。

trans-unit.source: The method does not reflect any personalization changes, which might mean that controls in the initial collection have actually been moved by a user into another zone.
trans-unit.target: 此方法並不會反映任何個人化變更，可能表示，初始集合中的控制項實際上已移使用者到另一個區域。

trans-unit.source: The initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are not necessarily the same as the collection contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property of the zone, which reflects the actual current collection of controls in the zone when a page is rendered, taking into account any personalization changes that have been made.
trans-unit.target: 初始集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項不一定與集合中包含相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>的區域，會轉譯頁面時，取得反映實際的目前集合的區域中控制項的屬性為帳戶所做的任何個人化變更。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.GetInitialWebParts" /> method is abstract, so it must be implemented by derived classes.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.GetInitialWebParts" />方法是抽象的因此它必須由衍生類別實作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone.GetInitialWebParts" /> method of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" /> class contains one implementation of the method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone.GetInitialWebParts" />方法<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone" />類別包含一種方法的實作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a footer area.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示區域是否具有頁尾區。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果區域有頁尾區，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasFooter%2A> property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasFooter%2A>屬性會覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為預設值`false`如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a header area.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示區域是否具有頁首區。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the zone has a header area; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果區域有頁首區，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" /> when the page is in normal <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode" />.
trans-unit.target: 當頁面處於標準 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode" /> 時，預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasHeader%2A> property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls when the page display mode is in normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasHeader%2A>屬性會覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性設定為預設值`false`如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控制何時頁面顯示模式在正常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>。

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page is in one of the display modes that allow page design, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, then the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasHeader%2A> property is `true`, so that the specified zone can display header user interface (UI) elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 組件頁面是其中一種顯示模式，例如允許的頁面設計<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HasHeader%2A>屬性是`true`，以便在特定的區域可以顯示標頭使用者介面 (UI)項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object used to access Help content for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件的參考，該物件是用來存取區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的說明內容。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that enables users to access Help content on the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，可讓使用者存取區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的說明內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>以宣告方式或以程式設計方式，就可以存取屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can access it declaratively within a zone by using the `<asp:HelpVerb>` element to set the text, the description, whether the verb is enabled, and other attributes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以存取以宣告方式在區域中使用`<asp:HelpVerb>`項目來設定文字、 描述、 是否啟用動詞命令，以及其他屬性。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to declare a help verb for a zone, however, because it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 因為預設會啟用不需要宣告一個區域，不過，說明動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: The only step that is necessary to enable a help verb to appear on the verbs menu of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone at run time is to assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> property for individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的動詞命令功能表上的說明動詞命令是必要的唯一步驟<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域在執行階段中的控制項是要指派值給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。
