trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to work, in addition to the following code, you need a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例中，除了要使用下列程式碼中，您需要自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can either use your own control, or use the code for the custom `TextDisplayWebPart` control found in the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用自己的控制項，或使用自訂程式碼`TextDisplayWebPart`的範例 > 一節中找到的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: This code example includes a user control to enable you to change display modes on a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例包含使用者控制項，可讓您變更網頁上的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about display modes and the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0).
trans-unit.target: 如需顯示模式，此控制項中的原始碼的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。

trans-unit.source: This code example also includes an HTML page that could contain Help content for the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例也包含可包含的說明內容的 HTML 網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。

trans-unit.source: For this example to work, you must save the following code in a file named Textwebparthelp.htm and place it in the same directory of your site as the .aspx page that hosts the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.
trans-unit.target: 要讓範例能夠運作，您必須將下列程式碼儲存在名為 Textwebparthelp.htm 檔案，並將它放在您的網站所裝載的.aspx 頁面與相同的目錄`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。

trans-unit.source: The code example also includes the following partial class that contains the code to handle the events in the .aspx page.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例也會包含下列部分類別，其中包含的程式碼中處理事件的.aspx 頁面。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code example is the .aspx page that hosts the `TextDisplayWebPart` control and demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的其他部分是裝載的.aspx 網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制，並示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Notice that near the top of the page, an `<@ Register %>` declaration is used to reference the compiled `TextDisplayWebPart` control, which should be placed in a subfolder named Bin.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，頁面頂端附近`<@ Register %>`宣告用來參考編譯`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，應該放在 bin 子資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> property is used declaratively on the `<asp:WebPartZone>` element to set the text for the verb, as shown in the following code example.
trans-unit.target: 也請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>屬性用於以宣告方式`<asp:WebPartZone>`項目來設定動詞的文字，如下列程式碼範例所示。

trans-unit.source: Finally, note in the following code example that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> property is set on the `<aspSample:TextDisplayPart>` element to provide the URL to the Help file.
trans-unit.target: 最後，請注意下列的程式碼範例，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>上設定屬性`<aspSample:TextDisplayPart>`項目提供的說明檔的 URL。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, click the **Catalog Mode** menu item in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，請按一下**目錄模式**中的功能表項目**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, close the catalog, and return the page to normal browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 新增`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項加入頁面、 關閉目錄，然後返回頁面一般瀏覽模式。

trans-unit.source: If you click the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, you can access the help verb to open the Help page.
trans-unit.target: 如果您按一下動詞命令下拉式功能表中的標題列`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，您可以存取用來開啟 [說明] 頁面的說明動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether controls in a zone are arranged vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出區域中的控制項是垂直排列或是水平排列。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation" /> value that determines how controls in a zone are arranged.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation" /> 值，決定區域中控制項的排列方式。

trans-unit.source: The default orientation is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Vertical" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設方向是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Vertical" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property concerns how Web Parts controls are laid out in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>屬性是有關如何 Web 組件控制項的配置區域中。

trans-unit.source: With the default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Vertical> orientation, the controls are rendered in a top-to-bottom arrangement, according to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> value of each control.
trans-unit.target: 使用預設<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Vertical>方向，以由上到下排列，呈現控制項根據<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>每個控制項的值。

trans-unit.source: With a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Horizontal> orientation, the controls are arranged side by side, subject to the width of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 與<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Horizontal>方向，控制項的排列並存，受限於區域的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer can affect the height of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and the height of the zone that contains it.
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 可能會影響的高度<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，以及包含該區域的高度。

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer renders web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions), or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page).
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 會呈現在相容性模式 （回溯相容於舊版瀏覽器），或在標準模式中的網頁 (取決於是否存在`DOCTYPE`頁面中的宣告)。

trans-unit.source: For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property.
trans-unit.target: 這些模式的相關資訊，請參閱 DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)屬性。

trans-unit.source: When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, in some scenarios it does not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is `<td height="100%">`.
trans-unit.target: 當 Internet Explorer 會呈現標準模式中的頁面時，在某些情況下它不會不調整大小資料格在資料表中，即使是儲存格的 HTML 標記`<td height="100%">`。

trans-unit.source: As a result, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 如此一來，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項和其包含的區域會轉譯，讓控制項執行自動縮放以內部網路區域的全部高度。

trans-unit.source: This type of rendering occurs in two cases.
trans-unit.target: 在兩個情況下，就會發生這種類型的轉譯。

trans-unit.source: When a zone's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Vertical>, and you explicitly set the height on the zone.
trans-unit.target: 當區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Vertical>，而且您在區域上明確設定高度。

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontal zone.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用控制項填滿區域的全部高度，請勿指定水平區域的高度。

trans-unit.source: When a zone's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Horizontal>, and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone (or of the contained controls).
trans-unit.target: 當區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation.Horizontal>，且未明確設定的區域 （或包含的控制項） 的高度。

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertical zone.
trans-unit.target: 若要啟用控制項填滿區域的全部高度，設定的區域或高度控制項的垂直區域中。

trans-unit.source: The code example in this topic demonstrates normal usage of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 本主題的程式碼範例示範如何正常使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates the height-related rendering issue and how to work around it, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例，示範高度相關的轉譯問題，以及如何解決它，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the declarative and programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式和以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>屬性包含指派給它的宣告式標記中的值。

trans-unit.source: This value impacts `WebPartZone1`, after you load the page into a browser.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會影響`WebPartZone1`之後您網頁瀏覽器中載入。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts controls in the zone are rendered horizontally.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件中的控制項區域會以水平方式轉譯。

trans-unit.source: You can click the **Toggle Layout Orientation** button to change the orientation of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 您可以按一下**切換版面配置方向**按鈕來變更區域的方向。

trans-unit.source: The code to toggle the orientation occurs in the following code example from the partial class.
trans-unit.target: 切換方向的程式碼就會發生在下列程式碼範例來自部分類別。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the enumerated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 此值不是其中一個列舉的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state.
trans-unit.target: 先前儲存的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.
trans-unit.target: 載入先前儲存的區域狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, you can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LoadViewState%2A> method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to load state for the verbs and the verbs menu in a zone derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LoadViewState%2A>方法會覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法載入狀態，進行動詞命令和在區域中的動詞命令功能表衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別。

trans-unit.source: The size of the <paramref name="savedState" /> object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 物件的大小不等於目前檢視狀態物件的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes that are applied to the check mark image that appears on a verbs menu next to the selected verb text.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式屬性，這些屬性會套用至動詞命令功能表上已選取動詞命令文字旁邊的核取記號影像。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the style attributes for check mark images in a verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，包含動詞命令功能表中核取記號影像的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuCheckImageStyle%2A> property applies only when there is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object in a verbs menu that has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property value set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuCheckImageStyle%2A>屬性適用於自訂時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>具有動詞命令功能表中的物件及其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>屬性值設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The style attributes contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuCheckImageStyle%2A> property pertain to the style of the check mark image that appears next to the verb's text in the menu.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuCheckImageStyle%2A>屬性相關的功能表中的動詞命令的文字旁邊出現的核取記號影像樣式。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone has its own verbs menu in its title bar.
trans-unit.target: 每個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域就會在其標題列中有它自己的動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: The verbs menu can contain both standard verbs included in the Web Parts control set, and custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects created by developers.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令功能表可以包含這兩個標準指令動詞，包含在 Web 組件控制項集合，而且自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>開發人員所建立的物件。

trans-unit.source: The standard verbs in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control verbs menu--including the verbs for exporting, deleting, and opening a Help page--are single-action verbs that carry out their tasks once and are done.
trans-unit.target: 中的標準動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制動詞命令功能表-包括匯出、 刪除和開啟說明的動詞命令單向動作動詞命令，執行其工作一次並完成頁面。

trans-unit.source: There is no need to ever mark these verbs in the menu with a check mark, because none of them indicate any sort of continuing state.
trans-unit.target: 沒有需要標記的核取記號，功能表中的這些動詞命令，因為無一表示任何繼續狀態。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property on these verbs cannot be set, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuCheckImageStyle%2A> property does not apply to them at all.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>無法設定這些動詞命令上的屬性，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuCheckImageStyle%2A>屬性不會完全不套用它們。

trans-unit.source: However, developers can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> control that might indicate a continuing state with a check mark, by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 不過，開發人員可以建立自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>控制項可能會指出繼續狀態的核取記號，藉由設定其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image used as a check mark in the verbs menu of each <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定影像的 URL，該影像是用來做為區域中各個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項動詞命令功能表中的核取記號。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used as a check mark.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示當做核取記號之影像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes that are applied to the label of a verbs menu in the title bar of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control when a user positions the mouse pointer over the label.
trans-unit.target: 取得樣式屬性，這些屬性是在使用者將滑鼠指標置於標籤上時，套用至 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項標題列中動詞命令的標籤。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains the style attributes for the label in a verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，包含動詞命令功能表中標籤的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelHoverStyle%2A> property affects the style of the entire label for the verbs menu in each Web Parts control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelHoverStyle%2A>屬性會影響整個區域中的每個 Web 組件控制項中的動詞命令功能表標籤的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelHoverStyle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelHoverStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelHoverStyle%2A> property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelHoverStyle%2A>屬性包含指派給它的宣告式標記中的值。

trans-unit.source: This value impacts `WebPartZone2`.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會影響`WebPartZone2`。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page into a browser, switch the page into edit mode, and position your mouse pointer over the verbs menu of the Web Parts control.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器中載入網頁之後，將頁面切換至編輯模式，並將滑鼠指標移到網頁組件控制項的動詞命令功能表。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the text of the label turns bold.
trans-unit.target: 請注意標籤的文字會變成粗體。

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for the label of the verbs drop-down menu that appears in the title bar of each <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得標籤的樣式資訊，也就是顯示於區域中各個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項標題列之動詞命令下拉式功能表的標籤。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains style information for the label of the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，包含動詞命令功能表標籤的樣式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A> property affects the style of the label on the verbs menu of each Web Parts control in a zone, regardless of whether the label contains an image, text, or both.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>屬性會影響的區域，不論標籤是否包含影像、 文字或兩者中的每個 Web 組件控制項的動詞命令功能表標籤的樣式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A> property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>屬性包含指派給它的宣告式標記中的值。

trans-unit.source: This value impacts `WebPartZone2`.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會影響`WebPartZone2`。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page into a browser, switch the page into edit mode, and notice that the color for the verbs menu label in `WebPartZone2` is the color assigned to it in the declarative markup.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器中載入網頁之後，將頁面切換至編輯模式，並請注意，動詞命令功能表的色彩標示在`WebPartZone2`是指派給它的宣告式標記中的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that serves as a label for the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，做為區域中各個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項標題列之動詞命令下拉式功能表的標籤。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the text that appears in the label for the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含顯示於動詞命令功能表之標籤中的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelText%2A> property is assigned a value, the label appears alongside an image that represents the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelText%2A>屬性指派值，標籤會顯示代表動詞命令下拉式功能表中的標題列，每個影像的旁邊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If no value is assigned to the property, only the image appears on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有值指派給屬性時，功能表會出現映像。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that opens the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used to open the verbs drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示影像的 URL，該影像可用於開啟動詞命令下拉式功能表。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If no value is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuPopupImageUrl%2A> property, a default image that looks like a downward arrow is provided to open the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes for the drop-down verbs menu that appears on <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得下拉式動詞命令功能表的樣式屬性，該功能表會顯示在區域中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項上。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle" /> that contains style attributes for the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle" />，包含動詞命令功能表的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuPopupStyle%2A> property enables you to set style attributes for the drop-down verbs menu that appears on each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuPopupStyle%2A>屬性可讓您設定每個出現的下拉式清單動詞命令功能表的樣式屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: While the object itself is read-only, you can still set values for the underlying attributes.
trans-unit.target: 雖然物件本身是唯讀，您仍然可以設定基礎屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: You can set style attributes for the entire menu, such as its border color, style, and width; font details; height and width; background color; cell padding and spacing; shadow color (if shadowing is enabled in the user's operating system); and gridlines.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定整個功能表，例如其框線色彩、 樣式和寬度，樣式屬性字型詳細資料。高度和寬度。背景色彩。資料格填補和間距。陰影色彩 （如果使用者的作業系統中啟用遮蔽）;和格線。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuPopupStyle%2A> property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property value is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode.Menu>, which is the default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuPopupStyle%2A>屬性時，才適用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>屬性值設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode.Menu>，預設值。

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for the appearance of a verb in a verbs drop-down menu when an end user positions the mouse pointer over the verb.
trans-unit.target: 取得動詞命令外觀的樣式資訊，也就是使用者將滑鼠指標置於動詞命令上時，動詞命令下拉式功能表中動詞命令的外觀。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains style information for a verb when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，包含當使用者將滑鼠指標置於動詞命令上時，動詞命令的樣式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The style information contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbHoverStyle%2A> property applies to an individual verb in a verbs menu, when a user positions a mouse pointer over one of the verbs.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的樣式資訊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbHoverStyle%2A>屬性適用於個別的動詞命令在動詞命令功能表中，當使用者將滑鼠指標移到其中一個指令動詞。

trans-unit.source: Although this property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是唯讀的雖然您可以設定的樣式屬性的基礎<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>物件。

trans-unit.source: Because the menu that contains the verbs is created using Microsoft Internet Explorer's pop-up object, the menu does not correctly render its border when you place your mouse pointer over verbs that have different text lengths.
trans-unit.target: 因為使用 Microsoft Internet Explorer 的快顯的物件來建立包含動詞命令的功能表時，功能表不會正確呈現其框線時滑鼠指標放在不同的文字長度的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: The best workaround for this is to declare a `<MenuVerbHoverStyle>` element with an invisible border, so the menu width for all verbs is exactly the same size.
trans-unit.target: 最佳解決這個問題是宣告`<MenuVerbHoverStyle>`元素不可見的框線，因此所有動詞命令的功能表寬度是完全相同的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object that enables end users to minimize <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓使用者將區域中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項最小化。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that enables end users to minimize <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，可讓使用者將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項最小化。

trans-unit.source: The minimize verb referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> property appears in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 所參考的最小化動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>屬性會出現在每個動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in all page display modes.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令會出現在所有頁面顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Minimizing a control collapses it down to a smaller size, leaves only the title bar of the control visible, and makes a restore verb visible in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 最小化控制項它摺疊較小的大小、 離開只標題列控制項的可見，並還原動詞命令顯示的標題列中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要的範例 > 一節中的所有程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the minimize verb is enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 以下的部分程式碼範例是部分類別中，從，而且包含切換是否要啟用或停用最小化動詞命令的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and contains the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的其他部分是網頁上裝載自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項且包含使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the declarative `<MinimizeVerb>` element in the zone sets the value for the `Description` attribute text, which appears as a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb in the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，宣告式`<MinimizeVerb>`區域中的項目設定的值`Description`屬性的使用者將滑鼠指標透過動詞命令功能表中的動詞時，會顯示為工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並加入`TextDisplayWebPart`控制權傳輸至頁面上，如果未新增。

trans-unit.source: You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the minimize verb on the `TextDisplayWebPart` control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用核取方塊來啟用和停用最小化動詞`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。

trans-unit.source: When the verb is enabled, you can also click it to minimize the control.
trans-unit.target: 啟用指令動詞時，您也可以按一下控制項降到最低。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to be minimized.
trans-unit.target: 要最小化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Minimizes a selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 最小化區域中已選取的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeWebPart%2A> method is called when a user clicks the minimize verb on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeWebPart%2A>當使用者按一下的最小化動詞命令時，呼叫方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> property value for the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState.Minimized>.
trans-unit.target: 方法會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>針對選取的屬性值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制權傳輸至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState.Minimized>。

trans-unit.source: A minimized <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control collapses within its zone and hides its contents, and only its title bar remains visible.
trans-unit.target: 最小化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項摺疊區域中，並隱藏其內容，並僅其標題列保持可見狀態。

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法應該只能由衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>這類區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: You can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method in a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone class to add additional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects to the collection of standard verbs in your zone.
trans-unit.target: 您可以覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>中衍生方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域類別，以新增其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件加入您的區域中的標準動詞的集合。

trans-unit.source: You can do this by adding verbs to the collection in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由新增至集合中的動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbsEventArgs.Verbs%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a way to create a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event by overriding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method to add a custom verb to a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>藉由覆寫事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法將自訂的指令動詞新增至衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: The code example contains two source files.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含兩個原始程式檔。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to run, you must compile this source code.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。

trans-unit.source: You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: This code example uses dynamic compilation.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。

trans-unit.source: For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08).
trans-unit.target: 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。

trans-unit.source: The first part of the code example is the source code for a simple control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第一個部分會是原始碼的簡單控制項衍生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別。

trans-unit.source: The second part of the code example is the source code for a derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone that overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method to add a custom verb to the zone.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第二個部分是針對衍生的原始程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法將自訂的指令動詞新增至區域。

trans-unit.source: The code also creates a custom verb that appears in the verbs menu of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained in the zone, and the verb creates another copy of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼也會建立自訂動詞命令顯示的動詞命令功能表中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項包含在此區域中，並動詞命令建立另一份目前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The third part of the code example is a Web page that hosts the derived zone and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的第三個部分是裝載在衍生的區域的網頁和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Near the top of the page is a `Register` directive to reference the derived zone component.
trans-unit.target: 在頁面頂端附近是`Register`指示詞參考衍生的區域元件。

trans-unit.source: If you load the page in a browser, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control appears in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果瀏覽器，將頁面載入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項會出現在區域中。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu, then click the **CopyWebPart** verb, and it creates a copy of the control.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 [動作] 功能表，然後按一下**CopyWebPart**動詞命令，並建立一份控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnPreRender%2A> method calls the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.OnPreRender%2A> method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, and then creates all the verbs in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnPreRender%2A>方法會呼叫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.OnPreRender%2A>方法中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>類別，並接著在區域中，會建立所有動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: This allows page developers to make programmatic changes to the verbs in a zone before the view state is saved and the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓網頁開發人員透過程式設計方式變更區域中的動詞命令之前儲存檢視狀態和頁面呈現。

trans-unit.source: The postback argument.
trans-unit.target: 回傳引數。

trans-unit.source: Updates the status of the current collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone, based on the changes that have occurred since the most recent postback event.
trans-unit.target: 根據最近回傳事件以來所發生的變更，更新區域中目前 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項集合的狀態。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the zone's content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，收到區域內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the zone to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將區域呈現至指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A> method overrides the base method from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class to set values for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>方法會覆寫基底方法，從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>類別來設定的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderColor%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the zone's body content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，收到區域的主體內容。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫基底方法以呈現繼承自 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 類別之區域的主體區域。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A> method renders the body area of a zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>方法呈現的區域，這是主要內容區域的頁首和頁尾區域之間，且包含主體區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A> method overrides the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply uniquely to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>方法會覆寫中的基底方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>類別，以提供位址配置和樣式的特定的轉譯屬性 (attribute) 套用至唯一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域。

trans-unit.source: The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property is set to vertical or horizontal, and whether the page is currently in design display mode.
trans-unit.target: 方法會呈現資料表，其中包含主體的整個內容，並在該資料表中，設定不同的屬性值，依據各種條件，包括是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>屬性設定為垂直或水平，及是否頁面目前為設計顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the UI elements that indicate where a control can be dropped.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，接收指出控制項可置放之處的 UI 項目。

trans-unit.source: Renders user interface (UI) elements to indicate to an end user where a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that is being dragged can be dropped within a zone.
trans-unit.target: 呈現使用者介面 (UI) 項目，向使用者指出正在拖曳的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項可置放在區域中的哪個位置。

trans-unit.source: If a page is in design display mode, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property is set to `true` (the default), users can change a page's layout by dragging <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls within and between zones.
trans-unit.target: 若頁面位於設計顯示模式，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>屬性設定為`true`（預設值），使用者可以變更頁面配置，藉由拖曳<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>與區域間的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A> method renders UI elements, depending on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property of the zone, that indicate to users where a control that is being dragged can be dropped.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>方法呈現 UI 項目，取決於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>的區域，表示使用者可以卸除正在拖曳的控制項屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the content of the header.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，接收頁首的內容。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base method to render the header of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone that contains <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫基底方法，以呈現包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 控制項之 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 區域的頁首。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A> method overrides the base method so that it can render a header unique to zones that derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class and contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>方法覆寫基底方法，讓它可以轉譯標頭唯一衍生自區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別，並包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> zone, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone does not require verbs in its header.
trans-unit.target: 不同於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>區域，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>區域不需要在其標頭中的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: All it requires is a single-celled table, a zone title, and the style attributes applied to the title.
trans-unit.target: 它需要的就是單一儲存格的資料表、 區域標題，並套用至標題的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object that enables end users to restore <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in a zone to normal size.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓使用者將區域中的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項還原為標準大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that enables end users to restore <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，可讓使用者還原 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: The restore verb referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A> property appears within the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone, when a control is minimized.
trans-unit.target: 還原動詞命令所參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>屬性出現在每個動詞命令功能表內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>在區域中，當控制項最小化的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the menu in all page display modes.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令功能表中出現在所有頁面的顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Restoring a control expands it back to its normal size after the control has been previously minimized.
trans-unit.target: 還原的控制項，將它展開其一般大小之後先前小化控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the code example to work, you need all the code from the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例能夠運作，您需要的範例 > 一節中的所有程式碼<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following part of the code example is from the partial class, and contains the code that toggles whether the restore verb is enabled or disabled.
trans-unit.target: 以下的部分程式碼範例是部分類別中，從，而且包含切換還原動詞命令為啟用或停用的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The other part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control and contains the user interface (UI).
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例的其他部分是網頁上裝載自訂<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項且包含使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the declarative `<RestoreVerb>` element in the zone sets the value for the `Description` attribute text, which appears as a ToolTip when a user positions the mouse pointer over the verb in the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，宣告式`<RestoreVerb>`區域中的項目設定的值`Description`屬性的使用者將滑鼠指標透過動詞命令功能表中的動詞時，會顯示為工具提示文字。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page in a browser, switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the `TextDisplayWebPart` control to the page, if it has not been added.
trans-unit.target: 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並加入`TextDisplayWebPart`控制權傳輸至頁面上，如果未新增。

trans-unit.source: Use the minimize verb to minimize the control, and note that the restore verb becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: 使用最小化控制項，並記下還原動詞命令會變成可見的最小化動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: You can use the check boxes to enable and disable the restore verb.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用核取方塊，啟用和停用還原動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to be restored.
trans-unit.target: 要還原的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: Restores a selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control that was minimized to normal state.
trans-unit.target: 將最小化且已選取的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項還原為標準狀態。

trans-unit.source: If a zone's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property is set to `true`, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in that zone has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A> property set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState.Minimized>, invoking the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreWebPart%2A> method returns the control to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState.Normal> state, which means normal size and appearance.
trans-unit.target: 如果區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>屬性設定為`true`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>該區域中的控制項具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ChromeState%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState.Minimized>、 叫用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreWebPart%2A>方法會傳回控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeState.Normal>狀態時，這表示一般的大小和外觀。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreWebPart%2A> method is invoked when a user clicks the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A> verb.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreWebPart%2A>會叫用方法，當使用者按一下<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RestoreVerb%2A>動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法應該只能由衍生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>這類區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="webPart" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="webPart" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred after a page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自頁面回傳至伺服器以來所發生的任何檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: Returns the zone control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回區域控制項的目前檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the zone, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與區域相關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SaveViewState%2A> method invokes the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.SaveViewState%2A> method to render style attributes for the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SaveViewState%2A>方法會叫用基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.SaveViewState%2A>方法以呈現區域的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: It also saves state information for all the individual verbs and the verbs menu in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 它也會儲存在區域中的所有個別的動詞命令和動詞命令功能表的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for the appearance of a selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得區域中已選取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之外觀的樣式資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains style information for the selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，包含已選取 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的樣式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A> property allows you to access style characteristics for the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone when a Web Parts page is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A>屬性可讓您存取所選的樣式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>Web 組件頁面處於編輯模式時，區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A> property has a value assigned to it in the declarative markup.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A>屬性包含指派給它的宣告式標記中的值。

trans-unit.source: This value impacts `WebPartZone1`.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會影響`WebPartZone1`。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page into a browser, switch the page into edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器中載入網頁之後，將網頁切換至編輯模式。

trans-unit.source: On the verbs menu for one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, click the verb to edit the control, and note that the background color of the control changes to the color assigned to it in the declarative markup.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項中，按一下 編輯控制項，並記下此控制項的背景色彩變更成色彩指派給它的宣告式標記中的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether title icons are displayed in the title bar of each <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出標題圖示是否顯示在區域中各個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的標題列中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if title icons are displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果顯示了標題圖示，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ShowTitleIcons%2A> property has an effect on a zone only if one or more of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone have a value assigned for their respective <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ShowTitleIcons%2A>屬性有影響的區域，只有當一或多個<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項有值指派給其各自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.TitleIconImageUrl%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the title icons are displayed in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，標題圖示會顯示在區域中。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ShowTitleIcons%2A> property is set to `false`, none of the title icons for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ShowTitleIcons%2A>屬性設定為`false`，無標題圖示的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項都會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The postback argument.
trans-unit.target: 回傳引數。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of button used for the verbs in the title bar of <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項標題列中動詞命令所使用的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> that indicates what type of button is used for the verbs in the title bar of a control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" />，指出控制項標題列中動詞命令所使用的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbButtonType%2A> property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property value is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode.TitleBar>, which results in the standard verbs being rendered directly in the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbButtonType%2A>屬性時，才適用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>屬性值設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode.TitleBar>，結果會直接在每個的標題列中所呈現的標準動詞命令在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The type of button on the title bar can be a button, an image, or a hyperlink.
trans-unit.target: 在標題列按鈕的類型可以是為按鈕、 映像，或是超連結。

trans-unit.source: The value for the property is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes for verbs in the title bar of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項標題列中動詞命令的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" /> that contains style attributes for verbs.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style" />，其中包含動詞命令的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbStyle%2A> property enables you to retrieve a style object with style attributes for the verbs in the title bars of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbStyle%2A>屬性可讓您擷取所有的標題列中的動詞命令的樣式屬性的樣式物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The property applies only when verbs are actually rendered in the title bar, such as when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property value is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode.TitleBar>.
trans-unit.target: 只有當動詞命令實際會轉譯在標題列中，例如當該屬性適用於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>屬性值設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode.TitleBar>。

trans-unit.source: Although the object referenced by the property is read-only, you can still change the underlying style attributes for the verbs in the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 雖然屬性所參考的物件是唯讀，但您仍然可以變更標題列中的動詞命令為基礎的樣式屬性。

trans-unit.source: Begins the process of tracking view-state changes to a zone so that they can be stored in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object, and accessed through the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 開始追蹤區域檢視狀態變更的處理序，以便將它們儲存在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件中，並可透過 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState" /> 屬性存取。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TrackViewState%2A> method invokes the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.TrackViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to track the state of style attributes for the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TrackViewState%2A>方法會叫用基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.TrackViewState%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，以追蹤區域的樣式屬性的狀態。

trans-unit.source: It also initiates state tracking for all the individual verbs and style information for the verbs menu in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 它也會起始狀態追蹤個別的指令動詞和區域中的動詞命令功能表的樣式資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the kind of button associated with the verbs that exist in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> zone when accessed with an older browser.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定按鈕類型，以舊版瀏覽器進行存取時，該按鈕與存在於 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase" /> 區域中的動詞命令相關聯。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" /> that determines what kind of button is associated with the verbs in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType" />，決定與區域中動詞命令相關聯的按鈕類型。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts verbs represent actions that users can perform in the user interface (UI) of a Web Parts page, such as minimizing, closing, or restoring controls; adding controls to a page; or canceling an action.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件動詞表示使用者可以在 Web 組件頁面上，最小化、 關閉或還原的控制項，例如使用者介面 (UI) 中執行的動作將控制項加入頁面。或取消動作。

trans-unit.source: A verb is represented in the UI by a clickable object, which you can set to appear as a hyperlink, an image, or a button by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令由在 UI 中可點按的物件，您可以設定為使用會顯示為超連結、 影像或按鈕<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property applies to verbs that exist only at the zone level, as opposed to verbs that exist in each of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>屬性適用於只存在於區域層級，而不是存在於每個的動詞命令的指令動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you switch a page into catalog mode or edit mode, there are zone-level verbs in the footers of the zones that apply only to actions at the level of the entire zone.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您將頁面切換至目錄模式或編輯模式時，有區域層級動詞命令只會套用到整個區域層級的動作區域的頁尾中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property is applied when the Web Parts page is accessed with an older ("down-level") browser.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>與較舊的 （「 舊版 」） 瀏覽器存取 Web 組件頁面時，會套用屬性。

trans-unit.source: You must assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A> property for each specific verb to cause an image to appear for that verb in its zone.
trans-unit.target: 您必須指派值給<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.ImageUrl%2A>每個特定的動詞命令，會導致出現在其區域動詞的映像的屬性。

trans-unit.source: If you do not provide the URL to an image, the verb's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property defaults to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Link>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未提供影像的 URL，動詞命令的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>屬性預設為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ButtonType.Link>。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> object that determines the peripheral rendering for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> 物件的參考，該物件會決定區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項的週邊呈現。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" /> that determines rendering for controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome" />，決定區域中控制項的呈現。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of Web Parts controls contained within a zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含在區域中的 Web 組件控制項集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" /> that contains references to all the Web Parts controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection" />，包含區域中所有 Web 組件控制項的參考。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property can contain references to controls that inherit directly from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> class, as well as other ASP.NET server controls or custom controls within a zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>屬性可以包含參考，這些控制項的直接繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>類別，以及其他 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項或自訂區域內的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set dynamically wraps any control that is not a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> control at run time; this mechanism enables you to use all types of ASP.NET controls as Web Parts controls.
trans-unit.target: 動態設定的 Web 組件控制項包裝不是任何控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項作為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控制在執行階段; 這個機制可讓您使用 ASP.NET 控制項的所有型別作為 Web 組件控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the programmatic use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: For the full code example, including the code-behind source file and the .aspx page that contains the zone in this code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 完整的程式碼範例，包括程式碼後置原始程式檔和包含在此程式碼中，區域的.aspx 頁面，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The following code example accesses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property programmatically and displays a list of the controls contained in `WebPartZone1`.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例存取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>屬性以程式設計的方式，並顯示清單中所包含的控制項`WebPartZone1`。

trans-unit.source: After you load the page into a browser, click the button labeled **List WebPartZone1 WebParts**.
trans-unit.target: 瀏覽器中載入網頁之後，按一下 [] 按鈕**清單 WebPartZone1 WebParts**。

trans-unit.source: The IDs and types of the controls are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 顯示的識別碼和類型的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating how the verbs should be rendered on <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出動詞命令在區域中 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項上應該如何呈現。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode" /> enumeration value indicating how verbs should be rendered on <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode" /> 列舉值，指出動詞命令在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項上應該如何呈現。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode.Menu" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode.Menu" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property determines whether verbs on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone are rendered in the title bar of the controls, or in a drop-down verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>屬性會決定是否在動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>在標題列控制項，或在下拉式清單動詞命令功能表中的方式呈現區域中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If the verbs are to be rendered in the title bar, you can also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbButtonType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbStyle%2A> properties to change the appearance of the verbs.
trans-unit.target: 若要在標題列中呈現動詞命令，您也可以設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbButtonType%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.TitleBarVerbStyle%2A>屬性變更的指令動詞的外觀。

trans-unit.source: The value for the property is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 屬性的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode" /> 值。
